contents.text: Welcome to Qualys Peninsula, where we help you automate auditing, compliance, and protection for your IT systems and web applications.
For technical support and system status, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a vulnerability scanning specialist.

navigationGoals: I need help troubleshooting errors in my recent vulnerability scan results.
I need help interpreting the results of a network vulnerability scan on my servers.
Diagnose a failure in my vulnerability scanning engine on our network
I need someone to guide me step-by-step through running a vulnerability scan on my computer.
I need help tuning the vulnerability scanner to detect issues on our physics lab’s server.

contents.text: For web application security support, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a web application security specialist.

navigationGoals: I want guidance configuring web application security settings for my app.
I’d like assistance configuring a web application security scan for my new portal.
Configure WAF rules to resolve false positives in a web app security scan
I’d like help setting up protection for my small website against security threats.
Help me configure web application security checks for my research group’s website.

contents.text: For sales, billing, and new account inquiries, press 2.
To learn about auditing and compliance automation solutions, press 1.
Please hold while we transfer you to our sales team specializing in auditing and compliance automation.

navigationGoals: I’d like to learn about your auditing and compliance automation offerings.
I want details on pricing and contract options for your auditing and compliance automation solution.
Get pricing and API integration details for compliance audit automation
I want to learn about tools that automate compliance and auditing checks for my systems.
I’d like a quote and demo for automating compliance auditing on our lab infrastructure.

contents.text: For billing, invoices, and account questions, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our billing and accounting department.

navigationGoals: I need to review my latest invoice and clarify some billing charges.
I need to review my recent invoices and update my payment information.
Request an itemized breakdown of my latest invoice
I have a question about my latest invoice and need assistance understanding my bill.
I need clarification on my recent charge and a copy of the latest invoice for our student account.
